snippet: Chen Kegui was convicted for injuring a government official who broke into his home looking for his uncle, the human rights lawyer Chen Guangcheng.
lead_paragraph: Chen Kegui was convicted for injuring a government official who broke into his home looking for his uncle, the human rights lawyer Chen Guangcheng.

headline.seo: Chen Guangcheng’s Nephew Given 3 Years in Prison for Assault
headline.main: Nephew of Chinese Dissident Given 3 Years in Prison for Assault
headline.print_headline: Nephew of Chinese Dissident Given 3 Years in Prison for Assault
